name: MailChimp New Subscribers (Last 30 Days)
description: Zapier+MailChimp Description. Originates from the Gallery.

zapier-01.name: MailChimp Subscribers via Zapier
zapier-01.description: Get data on your recent MailChimp subscribers through Zapier. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new subscribers that are added after that.
